notes: [Added] Added support for Commerce Variants, Assets, Categories and DateTime fields.
[Added] Added support for Trumbowyg config files. They should be placed in `craft/app/config/trumbowyg` as a json file with the same name as the one used by Redactor for that field.
[Added] Added an option to lightswitches that allows them to toggle attributes on other inputs.
[Added] Added a `leftLabel` option to plain text fields that displays whatever you like on the left of the field.
